'''''Dreamlike''''' is an [[Event Quest]] during the [[Akitsu Kimodameshi]] Event.

==Steps==
# Investigate the mysterious door

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|After experiencing the Akitsu Yuugei, a mysterious doorway suddenly appeared nearby...}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(After completing [[Akitsu Kimodameshi/Leisurely Pastime#Men-Mayhem|Men-Mayhem]])
:'''Paimon:''' That was pretty fun... Huh? What's that?
:'''Paimon:''' Paimon doesn't remember seeing that before. When did that show up?
:'''Paimon:''' This looks like part of Akitsu Yuugei too... Should we go take a closer look? Paimon will let you decide.

;(Approach the domain)
:'''Paimon:''' This should be the place.
:'''Paimon:''' Paimon wonders what it's like inside. Let's go in and take a look!
{{Dialogue End}}
